original_text: And there was given unto him a mouth speaking great things and blasphemies; and power was given unto him to continue forty and two months.
korean_text: 또 짐승이 과장되고 신성 모독을 말하는 입을 받고 또 마흔두 달 동안 일할 권세를 받으니라

sentences.original_text: And there was given unto him a mouth
and power was given unto him
to continue forty and two months
